install.name: URL Normalizer (by JoomlaWorks)
install.author: JoomlaWorks
install.copyright: Copyright (c) 2006 - 2019 JoomlaWorks Ltd. All rights reserved.
install.description: Provides URL normalization & other features for Joomla.

param.name: originDomain
param.label: Define the origin domains (one below the other - do not use http:// or https://)
param.description: Don't use http:// or https:// in front of each origin domain or subdomain. Place each entry in a separate line. You can define a domain or subdomain port as well.

param.name: cdnDomain
param.label: Define the target domain - MUST use http:// or https://)
param.description: All origin domains & subdomains defined above with be overwritten to the target domain (thus the normalization).

param.name: redirectWithJS
param.label: Force redirect protocol
param.description: Please note that the redirection is done with JavaScript.

param.name: jsRedirectDomain
param.label: Force redirect to target domain
param.description: If a visitor directly requests one of the origin domains, a JavaScript based redirect can change the domain to the target domain defined.

param.name: browsercache
param.label: Use client-side (browser) caching
param.description: This setting instucts the browser to cache content locally.

param.name: cachetime
param.label: Cache lifetime for the home page (in mins)

param.name: cachetime_inner
param.label: Cache lifetime for every other page (in mins)
param.description: If no value is set, the 'home page' value will be used.

param.name: excludedComponents
param.label: Enter components to exclude from caching (one per line)

param.name: tidyState
param.label: Tidy state
param.description: Tidy reformats the output of the page by properly indenting code and removing inline CSS styles. The result improves client-side rendering. Use with caution. PHP's Tidy module must be precompiled with PHP.

param.name: tagsNotToStrip
param.label: Common social tags and new HTML5 tags are excluded - add your custom HTML tags here

param.name: wrap
param.label: Number of characters after which code will wrap
param.description: Enter the number of characters after which the code will be wrapped. If you want to disable this feature, clear the box or put 0If you wanna disable this feature

param.name: altText
param.label: Replacement text for empty alt tags
param.description: By default the plugin will enter 'Image' if you don't input anything.

param.name: cdataIndent
param.label: CDATA indentation
param.description: Enable indentation for code inside CDATA blocks.

param.name: breakBeforeBr
param.label: Break before br tag
param.description: This allows for better readability of code.
